CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 3, 1959, pg. A16, reads: "Courier Newsboy Wins Bike - John A. McHenry, 1411 Loraine St., North Side, accepts a bicycle he won for consistent sales of The Pittsburgh Courier, after averaging approximately 75 copies each week for two years. John is the son of Della and Charles McHenry, a Grade A student at Latimer Junior High School, attends Unity Center Church, and wants to be a physician.  Distributor Leroy Randall makes the presentation. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Leroy Randall and Pittsburgh Courier newspaper boy John A. McHenry, holding handlebars of Speedrite bicycle, standing in front of Pittsburgh Courier office, Centre Avenue, Hill District
